context_preview:
[Document 1] C:\Users\HP\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpkkuhxgvj.pdf
AI Engineer Intern Assignment: File-Based Multimodal
RAG for Test-Case / Use-Case Generation
Goal
Build a file-based Retrieval-Augmented Gen

use_cases.title: Image Ingestion and OCR Processing for Feature Identification
use_cases.goal: Verify the system correctly ingests an image, processes it through OCR, and identifies the feature it represents
preconditions: OCR and vision processing capabilities are enabled
steps: Ensure the system processes the image through the OCR and vision pipeline
Check the output for identified features or text
expected_results: The system successfully uploads and processes the image
OCR and vision analysis identifies relevant text or features within the image
negative_cases: Upload a corrupted or unsupported image file format and expect the system to flag an error
boundary_cases: Upload the largest supported image size to verify system's handling capability

use_cases.title: Link Extraction and Content Retrieval from Image
use_cases.goal: Ensure the system can extract links from images using OCR and retrieve content from those links
preconditions: OCR and vision processing is configured to extract text, including URLs, from images
Internet access is available for link content retrieval
steps: Process the image through OCR to extract text
Identify and follow the extracted URL to retrieve linked content
expected_results: The system detects and extracts the URL from the image accurately
The system successfully retrieves content from the extracted URL
negative_cases: Upload an image with a non-accessible URL and expect the system to handle the error gracefully
boundary_cases: Upload an image with the smallest readable URL text to test OCR's text extraction limits

use_cases.title: Multimodal File Handling and Feature Recognition
use_cases.goal: Test the system's ability to handle a multimodal input (text and image) to identify a specific feature
preconditions: System is capable of processing both text and image inputs simultaneously
Feature extraction algorithms are operational for both text and image data
steps: Upload both 'FeatureDescription.md' and 'FeatureImage.png' to the system
Process the text file for feature descriptions
Process the image file for visual feature identifications
Cross-reference the outputs to identify the common feature
expected_results: The system successfully identifies and matches the feature from both text and image inputs
negative_cases: Upload unrelated text and image files to test the system's ability to flag non-matching features
boundary_cases: Use the most complex image and text descriptions available to test the system's limit in feature recognition

assumptions: OCR and vision capabilities are sufficiently advanced to process and analyze images for text and features
The system has a feature extraction module that can cross-reference text and image inputs
